content: I've been married to my husband for over 2 years now, and we've been together for about 4 years total. We've had a great experience so far, and I'm grateful to have him as my partner. I'm a bit worried that the officer might ask us some tricky questions, but I'm hoping that our genuine relationship will shine through. Do you think the officer will ask us about our daily routine, like how we spend our free time or how we handle household chores?
